title: American fried chicken
directions: Slice the chicken into strips or nuggets
Add the wet ingredients to the dry and mix with a fork until blended (if you get any lumps use a whisk until they disappear)
Heat a large, deep frying pan containing about 1cm depth of olive oil (or other vegetable oil) until smoke is coming from the oil (i.e. until it's very hot)
Dip the chicken pieces in the batter (several at a time), coat thoroughly and use tongs to carefully put into the hot oil
Add another lot and then turn the first pieces when golden brown - they take about 2-3 minutes each side
Transfer to a plate lined with kitchen paper and carry on cooking the rest of the chicken in the same way
ingredients: Delicious served with chips, salad and coleslaw.
Chicken is a good source of protein.
